title: Ornamental Landscape
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Cup of cylindrical form with rounded base, loop handle; saucer round with flat bottom, raised edge. Both painted with imaginary landscape motifs in reds, blues, gilding
name: Cup and saucer
